DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the investigators study is to know the results of the endometriosis surgery and particularly to highlight a benefit of this surgery on fertility.
DOC.brief_title: Laparoscopic Surgical Management of Endometriosis on Fertility
DOC.criteria: Patients over 18 years Patients operated by laparoscopy for endometriosis in our department between 2006 and 2014. Patients under 18 years
